synthesis_conditions.washing_method: soaked in acetone for 5 days, acetone refreshed 2 times per day

synthesis_conditions.activation_method: evacuation at room temperature for 24 h

synthesis_conditions.humidity_condition: exposed to saturated CH3COOK solution (RH = ∼23%) at room temperature overnight
exposed to saturated NaBr solution (RH = ∼55%) at 30 °C overnight
exposed to saturated NaCl solution (RH = ∼75%) at room temperature overnight
soaked in 2 drops of water at room temperature for 2 h

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: thoroughly washed with CH3CN for at least 5 d, CH3CN refreshed 3 times per day
synthesis_conditions.activation_method: heating at 80 °C under vacuum for 12 h

synthesis_conditions.humidity_condition: exposed to saturated CsF solution (RH = ∼4%) at room temperature overnight
exposed to saturated LiCl solution (RH = ∼11%) at room temperature overnight

synthesis_conditions.time: varied (0.5 h to 48 h) to achieve different Co/Zn ratios
